TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CustomProviderDataAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class CustomProviderDataAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class CustomProviderDataAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 为配置文件属性的提供程序提供自定义数据的字符串。

span.span: Provides a string of custom data to the provider for a profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于提供的数据与自定义配置文件提供程序的配置文件属性的字符串。The class is used to supply a string of data with a profile property to a custom profile provider. 自定义数据字符串可以设置为任何字符串值和使用设置`customProviderData`添加配置文件属性的配置元素的属性。The custom data string can be set to any string value and is set using the `customProviderData` attribute of the configuration element for adding profile properties. 如果`customProviderData`设置属性，则值将放入属性的集合，并按名称"CustomProviderData。"编制索引If the `customProviderData` attribute is set, then the value is placed in the collection for the property and is indexed by the name "CustomProviderData."

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string customProviderData) cil managed

param.name: customProviderData
param.span: 要提供给提供程序的自定义数据的字符串。

span.span: The string of custom data to supply to the provider.

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例，并指定自定义数据的字符串。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies a string of custom data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于提供的数据与自定义配置文件提供程序的配置文件属性的字符串。The class is used to supply a string of data with a profile property to a custom profile provider. 自定义数据字符串可以设置为任何字符串值和使用设置`customProviderData`添加配置文件属性的配置元素的属性。The custom data string can be set to any string value and is set using the `customProviderData` attribute of the configuration element for adding profile properties. 如果`customProviderData`设置属性，则值将放入属性的集合，并按名称"CustomProviderData。"编制索引If the `customProviderData` attribute is set, then the value is placed in the collection for the property and is indexed by the name "CustomProviderData." 此构造函数是使用.NET Framework 并不从应用程序代码中调用。This constructor is used the .NET Framework and is not intended to be called from application code.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomProviderData As String
public: property System::String ^ CustomProviderData { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取配置文件属性提供程序的自定义数据的字符串。

span.span: Gets a string of custom data for the profile property provider.

value.span: 配置文件属性提供程序的自定义数据的字符串。

span.span: A string of custom data for the profile property provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用设置属性值`customProviderData`添加配置文件属性的配置元素的属性。The property value is set using the `customProviderData` attribute of the configuration element for adding profile properties. 属性可以设置为任何字符串值，以用于属性的配置文件提供程序。The property can be set to any string value to be used by the profile provider for the property. 如果`customProviderData`设置属性，则值将放入属性的集合，并按名称"CustomProviderData。"编制索引If the `customProviderData` attribute is set, then the value is placed in the collection for the property and is indexed by the name "CustomProviderData."

summary.span: 获取一个指示 属性是否被设置为默认值的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the property is set to the default value.

returns.span: 如果 属性设置为默认值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property is set to the default value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为属性是`null`，或空字符串类型的配置文件属性的`String`。The default value for the property is `null`, or an empty string for profile properties of type `String`.
